title: ALLIGATOR movie font
content:
This font is from the poster and title screen of the 1980 movie Alligator. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/386738_3808.1020.A_2.jpg)

author: pantherquest
